function.description:
Removes the browser cookie with the name cookie.
Cookie can be a string or a list. If cookie is a boolean with value true, then all cookies will be cleared. Current cookie information can be obtained through Web.pageInfo(). Cookies can be set using Web.setCookie(). Due to the nature of Xill IDE, all cookies will be removed with every restart.

example.title: Usage
example.header: Remove a cookie from a web page.
